name: Creepy Cat Collage Raspberry Deep V-Neck (free shipping!)
description: Look closely, or you might miss the fact that every cat has different eyes. Printed on a fresh American Apparel Deep V-Neck Tee using high mesh screens and ultra soft ink. After one wash you won’t feel any difference between the ink and the shirt. Available in both mens and women’s sizes. Sizing: chest measurement in inches XXS (29-31) XS (30-32) S (34-36) M (38-40) L (42-44) XL (46-48) (To know which size you should buy, take one of your shirts that fits perfectly and measure it from armpit to armpit and double it to see which size will fit you best. Please keep in mind American Apparel shirts tend to run small in mens sizes.) For a limited time, all orders feature a SPECIAL INTRODUCTORY PRICE and come with FREE DOMESTIC UPS SHIPPING! p.s. to view more pictures of this shirt, click here

name: Beefcake Syringe Wallpaper Slate Deep V-Neck (free shipping!)
description: We offer our tribute to beefcakes, complete with a subtle wallpaper that involves an heraldic ornament and syringe x’s. Printed by hand using professional equipment in a non-sweatshop. We use really soft ink that you won’t even feel after one wash. This is an American Apparel Deep V-Neck Tee. Available in both mens and women’s sizes.
